title: Interpretation of a dream about colorful birds

preview.html: If he looks at colorful birds, it shows the goodness that he will enjoy and the abundance of money and food that he will see, God willing. Interpretation of seeing colorful birds in a dream for a single girl: If an unmarried woman dreams of seeing many colorful birds in her home. Here, it indicates the abundance of goodness and livelihood that she will enjoy. This is the only dreaming girl in her life, God willing. And single people who dream that they are looking at colorful birds singing with their beautiful voice in the dream. Here is an indication that this single woman is very connected and interconnected with her family in life. Seeing a single pregnant woman trying to catch many colorful birds but she did not succeed It shows the things that this single, dreaming girl is looking for in her life at this time, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. The interpretation differs from the single woman who dreams of colorful birds singing in a dream. Here it indicates a strong and wonderful relationship that this single woman enters into her life and ends with a good relationship, God willing. God. See also: Interpretation of seeing a bird (birds) in a dream in detailInterpretation of seeing colorful birds in a dream for a married womanIf a married woman sees in a dream, she sees colorful birds around her and is happy with them in the dream. A sign of the goodness that this married woman will see in her life during This time. And seeing that a married woman sings in a dream with colorful birds, and is happy with them. Here it explains her strong and strong relationship with her family and her family in her private life. And seeing the death of many colorful birds in a dream for a married woman. An indication of the sad things that this married woman will see in her life. At this time, and God knows best. Either a married woman saw her husband buying many colorful birds in a dream. The meaning indicates that there is goodness and great support that this married woman and her husband will enjoy, God willing. Interpretation of seeing colorful birds in a dream for a divorced woman: If the divorced woman sees The dream is that she is looking for colorful birds in many places and did not find them. Here, it indicates something that this dreamer is trying to achieve in his life, but he cannot. The divorced woman who sees in the dream that the colorful birds were inside her house and she was happy with their presence in the dream. Here it explains the good things And the wonderful nutrition that this divorced woman will enjoy in her life during this time. As for the divorced woman who watches her husband in a dream as he takes care of the colorful birds in the dream. This is an indication that she will return again to her husband during this time and God Almighty. Like the divorced woman who dreams of the colorful birds. And she died. It indicates the sad things that this divorced woman will see in her life, and God is Most High and All-Knowing. Read also: Interpretation of seeing birds in a dream according to Imam Al-Sadiq. Interpretation of seeing colorful birds in a dream about the man and its meaning. If the dreamer sees in a dream that he is taking many colorful birds and holding them. He interprets that. The presence of abundant sustenance and great goodness that this dreamer enjoys in his life, God willing. Either he sees that the dreamer was searching for colorful birds in some place.

title: Interpretation of seeing giving a fish in a dream?

preview.html: Interpretation of seeing giving a fish in a dream? Seeing fish in a dream is one of the dreams that suggest many interpretations, as this dream is one of the happy dreams that indicate the occurrence of beautiful events in the fortuneteller's life, and fish can suggest many interpretations and these interpretations can differ from person to person and through our article, we will discover what it means to see giving a fish in a dream. Seeing giving fish in a dream for Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin explained that if a person sees in his dream that he is fishing and its color is brown, this indicates success and success in life, and if he sees that he is catching a dead fish, this means that he is seeking to fulfill a wish. But he cannot achieve it. If a person sees in a dream that he is catching a salty fish, this means that he has put in a lot of effort without getting a lot of money, but if he sees that he is catching a certain number of fish, this indicates his presence. From the women in this person's life. Seeing fish in a dream, if there are many, means a lot of food and a lot of money. If one sees in his dream that he is fishing in very fresh water, this means that he will get a lot of money and food, and if he sees that he enters a swampy sea and gives a large fish, this means that he will be unfair and lose a lot of money. If one sees in a dream that he is looking into the mouth of a fish and takes money from it, this means that he will get a lot of money, but only through his wife. Giving fish in a dream to an unmarried woman Ibn Sirin explained that if an unmarried girl sees in her dream that she is eating cooked fish, then this vision is considered a commendable vision, because it indicates that she will fulfill a great desire that has been long awaited, and indicates success and success in her life. If an unmarried girl sees that she is eating a polluted fish, this indicates that she will suffer from worries and sorrows. If an unmarried girl sees that someone is giving her a fish, this indicates a great achievement and the satisfaction of desires, and if the one who gave it to her is a man, this means her intimate marriage to a very rich and moral person. Eating fried fish or giving it indicates her pure life without trouble or effort for the girl, and shows her happiness with her fianc√© and the speed of her marriage to him and the establishment of the feast. Giving a fish in a dream to a pregnant woman Ibn Sirin explained that seeing a pregnant woman throwing fish in a dream indicates an abundance of food and great wealth and that a great change for the better will occur in her life. If a pregnant woman sees a live fish, this means that she will give birth soon and that the newborn will be a boy, God willing. In conclusion, we understood what it means to see a fish in a dream, because seeing a fish in a dream is considered one of the beautiful dreams that indicate the emergence of beautiful and happy events in the fortuneteller's life. It indicates wealth and happiness.

title: Interpretation of cooking chicken in a dream: Seeing cooked chicken in a dream

preview.html: Seeing chicken in a girl‚Äôs dream for a single, married or pregnant woman, whether she eats it with rice or fried chicken according to Ibn Sirin and more. Interpretation of a chicken in a dream. It is one of the strange dreams that we may see during our sleep, and this topic raises in our souls many questions about many topics that we cannot understand its relationship to. He sees in his dream that he is eating cooked chicken meat, then this is a sign of the many good things that he will receive and the good and happy things that will happen to him in the coming period. If the dreamer sees during his sleep that he is eating grilled, fried, or cooked chicken, then this is a sign of large and abundant financial gains that will happen to him. In the coming days, good things may come at the professional or family level. One of the meanings symbolized by cooked chicken in a dream is a lot of money and many material gains, especially when the dreamer‚Äôs financial circumstances are not good in reality. Anyone who dreams of eating cooked chicken breasts, this indicates the possibility of a change in work, finding a new job, or even traveling abroad for a job. On a new job opportunity. Whoever dreams that he is eating a cooked chicken leg and nothing else, this is a sign that his wife is of good character, kind-hearted and moral, and it shows the unmarried dreamer the possibility of establishing a relationship with a virtuous woman. Seeing cooked chicken in a pot can indicate the loss of debts to someone He had a lot of debts and benefited from some financial benefits that helped him with his many expenses in real life. Cooked chicken in a married woman‚Äôs dream is evidence of the stability she enjoys with her husband, with the possibility of pregnancy in the coming period. In a dream for a pregnant woman, cooked chicken is a sign of the birth of a boy. For a single woman, seeing cooked chicken in a dream indicates her imminent relationship with a suitable person who will guarantee her a decent life. Seeing cooked chicken is evidence of moderation in financial matters, paying off debts, and benefiting from additional income. Cooked chicken in a married woman‚Äôs dream shows her stability in her husband‚Äôs house while he is pregnant with a male child in the dream, while an unmarried woman who sees cooked chicken in her dream marries a capable man. Raw chicken in a dream symbolizes a woman who has no benefit behind her, and it also symbolizes Disturbances or cunning, raw chicken in one dream, a failed marriage, and in a married dream it symbolizes disagreements and family problems. Slaughtering a chicken in a dream is a sign of failure to observe zakat and build sound social relationships. A slaughtered chicken symbolizes deception and deception of a relative, and an unmarried woman who sees in her dream She slaughters a chicken and then gets married, but her family is angry. A roasted chicken in a dream indicates that she hears disturbing news, and a married woman who sees in her dream that she is eating a grilled chicken, is distracted by the affairs of her household. A slaughtered chicken either indicates a break in the relationship between the dreamer and the woman, which is full of ignorance and gossip. He does not get fat or satisfied with hunger. It indicates the marriage of the man with

title: Learn about the interpretation of mirrors in a dream from Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi

preview.html: Mirrors in the fingers have many different interpretations and proofs, so let us examine during the article the interpretation of seeing a mirror in a dream by the greatest experts of interpreters, the most famous of whom are Ibn Sirin and Al-Usaimi, so you can learn together. About the interpretation of seeing broken mirrors in a dream, or looking at them, or the filth of the mirrors, whether the fortuneteller is a girl, a woman, a pregnant woman, or a man. Mirrors in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about mirrors as a sign of approaching establishing a relationship with someone or completing marriage, as well as meeting a lover and lover. Seeing mirrors In a dream it also means that this dreamer will have a lot of good in his life and will get a big promotion, a big share in his field of work, in his job or in general good conditions in his life. Mirrors in a dream can also indicate death, not the death of the viewer, but the vision can relate to the surrounding friends, relatives, or even a member of the dreamer‚Äôs family. Unclean mirrors in a dream symbolize that this dreamer will face many problems in the future. All aspects of his life and he will suffer in his work and personal life and will be exposed to a financial and psychological crisis. The vision of looking at golden mirrors indicates the arrogance of the dreamer, in addition to his possession of a wonderful and strong personality and he cannot be equal among people. Mirrors in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that the interpretation of seeing mirrors in a dream It indicates that the dreamer has a good heart, good morals, and patience in difficult situations and days. Whoever sees in a dream his face in the mirrors beautiful and attractive to others, this is evidence that the dreamer is waiting for something, and this is a sign of its fulfillment. As for whoever dreams of seeing his face in the mirrors and it was ugly and pale This is evidence that the dreamer is going through difficult living conditions, and this dream is a sign of his dissatisfaction with this life. While whoever sees in his dream that his face is black, this is evidence that he enjoys a good reputation and good will among people. And whoever sees broken mirrors in his dream, this is a sign. However, the dreamer brings him unpleasant news. Interpretation of seeing mirrors and looking at them for a dreamer who is traveling, and his face was beautiful in the dream, is a sign that he will soon return home. Watching the person who saw himself in the mirror indicates that this fortuneteller has patience and responsibility. Interpretation of a dream about mirrors In a dream, and it was large, it showed that the dreamer feels a lack of attention and interest in the people around him and wants to attract attention. Mirrors in a dream Interpretation of a dream about mirrors in a dream Al-Osaimi is a sign of relief from worry and anxiety and the removal of worry, depression and sadness. Seeing mirrors in a dream means that the dreamer will hear happy news in waking life. Seeing mirrors in a woman‚Äôs dream is interpreted as one of the praiseworthy and promising dreams for the emergence of new changes in her life, which she very much desires to happen in reality. Seeing mirrors in a woman‚Äôs dream can also indicate that God will bless her with pregnancy soon. Seeing a mirror in a woman‚Äôs dream can also indicate that God will bless her with pregnancy soon. A man's dream shows his sense of confidence and determination in his decisions, in addition to the advantages that he possesses, which is his ability to

title: Interpretation of a dream about a scene in Al-Osaimi‚Äôs dream

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about a scene in a dream by Al-OsaimiInterpretation of dreamsThe scene in a dreamIf it is white, this indicates that the fortune teller is the one who forbade evil and commanded good. The dream of seeing a group of white tents is evidence of the graves of martyrs and is one of the praiseworthy dreams. Seeing a tent merchant in a dream is evidence of profit from the trade he works in. Interpretation of a dream about a scene for a single womanThe dream of seeing a scene in the dream of an unmarried girl bodes well and is one of the praiseworthy visions. The scene in general in a person's dream is evidence of emotional and psychological stability. Interpretation of a dream about a scene in a dream for a married womanThe dream of the sceneIn a dream, a married woman is considered a sign of home, children, and a good husband. If the tent is spacious in the dream, this indicates a large diet and abundant goodness that will come to her and her family in the near future. The dream of an extended tent proves a stable family situation. Interpretation of a dream about a scene in a dream about a pregnant womanIf a pregnant woman dreams that she is giving birth in a tent, this means that her son will be of great importance. If he sees in a dream that he is setting up a tent, this indicates the money he will get. Interpretation of a dream about a scene in a man's dreamThe scene in a man's dream is evidence that He will have the opportunity to travel. As for seeing many scenes in a dream, they show the worries and problems that the dreamer is in. But if he sees the tent overturning in a dream, this indicates a future that will be full of many problems. Add the dream you want to interpret by referring to the social status in a comment below the article and we will respond to it and clarify it.

title: Interpretation of seeing a grandmother or grandfather in a dream by Ibn Sirin

preview.html: I like it Fans Subscribers Fans Interpretation of seeing a grandmother or grandfather in a dream by Ibn Sirin, this dream indicates many interpretations and connotations that differ from one person to another in terms of the attitude and love for the grandparents and the extent of his closeness to them and their justice and according to his social and psychological condition, whether he is a man, woman or unmarried girl, it In a dream, it indicates good or bad news. Interpretation of a dream about a grandfather by Ibn Sirin. Seeing grandparents in a dream is evidence that the dreamer longs for the past. Seeing grandparents in a dream may indicate the fulfillment of the dreams and aspirations that the dreamer seeks. This vision may indicate a trip for fun and enjoyment. Seeing a grandfather smiling in a dream means that the dreamer is religious. Seeing a deceased grandfather in a dream may indicate avoiding sins and fun. Seeing a dead grandmother in a dream that she has come back to life indicates ambition and that the dreamer is a positive person. Interpretation of seeing a grandmother or grandfather in a dream. Dream symbol To love the person who sees the past, happy times and blessed days. Seeing them can indicate the pursuit of goals, dreams, ambitions and success. If seeing grandparents here means traveling for a walk or walking and changing location. The dream in a dream indicates that the grandfather when he smiles at the dreamer is approaching From God and shows signs of religiosity. Also, the vision here says not to play or have fun, stay away from sins and fear God. Seeing a grandmother coming back to life indicates great ambition and a positive and optimistic personality. Interpretation of seeing grandfather and grandmother in a dream for a single woman: A girl seeing her grandmother appears in an ugly and frightening form, expressive About despair, fear, and anxiety about something. Seeing a grandmother for an unmarried girl indicates abundance of sustenance and blessings, which indicates that it is a sign of goodness and happiness. When he saw the grandfather praying behind him, it appeared that he felt safe. Seeing a free girl, for grandparents together in a dream, indicates understanding. As well as stability in social life with his family. Interpretation of seeing a grandfather or grandmother in a married woman‚Äôs dream: When you see them together in a dream, this indicates kindness, life, and profit from lawful money soon. Seeing a grandmother in bed here indicates good nutrition for the offspring soon. When you see them talking to them, this indicates To the fulfillment of the desire and dream that you have been looking for within a few days. And when you see the grandfather and grandmother, it shows the good solutions in the house and the grace of this woman. The grandfather and grandmother in a dream for a pregnant woman. When you only see the grandfather in the dream giving birth to a child, this indicates that he will give birth to a girl and not A boy. And when you see the face of a smiling grandfather and joy appears, the time of birth is approaching. It indicates good skin and makes things easier. Interpretation of seeing a man‚Äôs grandparents. When you see a man‚Äôs grandfather and grandmother, O deceased, this indicates that you are blessed with sufficient and lawful livelihood. If a man sees his grandmother in a dream when he is young, this indicates On the relationship of that man with the righteous girl. Seeing grandparents in a dream means distress, anxiety, and crying for the monarch, and God knows best. If a grandfather sees a man in a dream, this indicates hard work and

title: Interpretation of colored eyes in a dream Green, red and black eyes in a dream

preview.html: Seeing the eye for the unmarried, for the married, for the pregnant woman, according to Ibn Sirin, the disease of the beautiful eye, the pupil of the eye, the eye out of place, seeing the eyebrows and eyelids Seeing the eyes in general in a dream is a sign of physiognomy, understanding, insight and the faculty that he has, which enables him to measure and weigh things to know the path The correct and distinguishing truth from falsehood in reality. It indicates the faith that the dreamer instills in his heart and the faith that he adheres to in the life he lives. The more eyes there are in the dream, the stronger the religion, faith, asceticism and piety in real life, until the dreamer becomes a faithful servant of his Lord, following His commandments. And the Sunnah of his Prophet, may God bless him and grant him peace. Himself to follow whims and fantasies. The person who sees in his dream that his eyes have turned green and this matter is different from what it is in real life, the dream indicates that the dreamer has followed a path and religion different from the one that those around him followed. People and that he went against their religion, whether his religion was the true religion or not, because of the reality in which the dreamer lives in waking life. As for someone who sees in his dream that his eyes have turned blue, and this is different from what they are in reality, then the dream indicates the whims and anger that the dreamer follows. In fact, he is a neglected person. The truth, and he falls into error that leads him to loss in the life of this world and the hereafter. But if the eyes are black in the dream, then the dream shows the strength of religion and faith that the dreamer has, and that he is a pious and righteous person who wants to perform acts of obedience and draw closer to God Almighty while he is awake. So if A person sees that his heart has one or two eyes or more, then this vision indicates the righteousness of the heart and its attachment to God Almighty and the righteousness that it encounters in reality. It was said that the sharpness of the eye in a dream is a sign of a good and praiseworthy relationship for the dreamer, and this contradicts if the eyes turn into pieces. Iron, this dream indicates the worry and anxiety that the viewer suffers from in reality, which makes the viewer‚Äôs life full of sadness, suffering, discomfort and peace.Interpretation of seeing the eye - YouTubeSeeing the whites of the eye - YouTubeInterpretation of blue, red and green eyes in a dream - YouTube

Interpretation of the dream of the uncle giving me money in a dream. Seeing borrowing from the uncle could indicate crises and problems that the dreamer is going through, and God knows all that we did not see. If an unmarried young man sees his uncle making remarks, it may lead to... This leads to the emergence of disputes with her uncle, and God knows the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees an invoice from her uncle, this may indicate disagreements with her uncle, and God knows best. It may also express the passing of some sudden financial crises, and God is Greatest and Most Knowing. Interpretation of a dream about an uncle crying in a dream. Interpretation of a dream about an uncle crying In a dream, crying can express that he is in a difficult situation with his uncle, and God knows everything that he does not see. If the dreamer sees his uncle crying and screaming in a dream, this may lead to the distress he is in, and God knows best. If a married man sees an uncle crying without a sound in a dream, it may be... That is a sign of goodness, and God is Most High and Most Knowing, and perhaps it indicates good news, God willing. Interpretation of a dream about an uncle‚Äôs chest in a dream. Interpretation of dreams about hugging an uncle in a dream can lead to kindness and sustenance, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. Whereas if the dreamer sees his uncle‚Äôs chest, this may indicate the benefit he reaps from his uncle, and God is All-Knowing. When a married woman sees her uncle‚Äôs embrace in a dream, this may represent strong relationships with her uncle, and God is Most High and Most Knowing. An organized uncle‚Äôs house expresses good and good news, and God knows all the unseen. When an unmarried girl sees her uncle‚Äôs house in a dream, she can express good news for the woman, and God knows the unseen. If a divorced woman sees her uncle‚Äôs house, this may lead to solidarity with the family, and God is Most High and knows you both that Seeing your uncle‚Äôs house in a state of chaos may indicate bad news, and God knows best. Interpretation of a dream about visiting an uncle in a dream may indicate that you are listening to the uncle‚Äôs advice, and God knows the unseen. If a young man sees himself in a dream visiting his uncle, he can express his love and attachment to the situation, and God knows best. The Most Sublime and Most Knowing Likewise, if an unmarried girl sees herself in a dream visiting her uncle, this may lead to her being negligent in relation to her uncle and not visiting him, and God knows best. If a married woman is seen visiting her uncle, this may indicate longing and longing to see the uncle, and God knows the unseen. title: Interpretation of a dream about easy childbirth for a pregnant woman by Ibn Sirin and the leading translators

preview.html: Interpretation of a dream about easy childbirth for a pregnant woman Childbirth in a dream is one of the wishes and dreams that many people want to achieve. We find that many girls want to see their children in their arms, and in this article we will discuss everything related to seeing an easy birth in a pregnant woman's dream, and many interpretations that some are looking for. Interpretation of a dream of an easy birth for a pregnant woman Childbirth in a pregnant woman's dream is one of the dreams that brings a lot of goodness, happiness and joy to receive the child. When a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she gave birth to a male child while carrying a girl in her stomach, the vision symbolizes the good reputation and good morals that distinguish the young girl with all the problems and crises with her husband. The pregnant woman sees that she is sad and her stomach is contracted, symbolizing the loss of the fetus and entering a state of depression. If a pregnant woman dreams of giving birth easily and without fatigue or discomfort, the vision symbolizes peace, reassurance and a feeling of stability in her married life and that all members of her family love her. If the dreamer is suffering from an illness and sees this vision, this indicates recovery, healing and the birth of a healthy fetus free of all diseases. Interpretation of a dream of an easy birth by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin sees in the interpretation of a dream of giving birth in a pregnant woman's dream that it symbolizes the death of disputes, difficulties and problems. If there are many problems with her husband And she saw in a dream that she was giving birth easily, this symbolizes the end of these problems and disputes and the return to normal life. A pregnant woman sees in her dream that a beautiful child is sleeping next to her, but she did not go through the labor period or feel tired, so the vision symbolizes her easy natural birth. Interpretation of a pregnant woman‚Äôs dream of giving birth by Imam al-Sadiq If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth, and it was easy, and she did not feel pain or pain, and gave birth to a calm and beautiful child, then the vision symbolizes the abundance of goodness and lawful. He will get money. Interpretation of a dream about a natural birth for a pregnant woman without pain by Ibn Shaheen Easy and natural birth in a dream for a pregnant woman, according to Ibn Shaheen‚Äôs interpretation, symbolizes the arrival of happiness and good news in her life. Although natural birth is tiring during childbirth, some people prefer it over a cesarean section, so natural birth is considered good news. Seeing a pregnant woman giving birth naturally in a dream without feeling pain is evidence of the presence of many problems in her life, but they will disappear in a short time and will be solved by happiness and pleasure. If a pregnant woman sees in her dream that she is giving birth naturally and without pain or fatigue, the vision symbolizes the emergence of many positive changes in the dreamer‚Äôs life that will change it for the better. Whoever sees in her dream that she is giving birth naturally and without pain, symbolizes constant thinking about the date of birth. Interpretation of a dream about an easy birth of a girl for a pregnant woman Seeing a pregnant woman in her dream that she is giving birth to a girl indicates the arrival of happy and happy news in her life. If the pregnant woman is at the beginning of her pregnancy and sees in her dream that she is giving birth to a girl, then

title: The most important interpretations of seeing a cemetery in a dream

preview.html: Seeing a cemetery in a dream: A cemetery is one of the things that can cause panic and anxiety to those who see it. As for seeing a cemetery in a dream, are we good or bad? We will explain this in the following lines to reassure the reader‚Äôs heart and not get distracted between different opinions. Read with us to find out what is new. Seeing a cemetery in a dream Seeing building a cemetery in a dream for the dreamer shows goodness and a lot of money that she will soon receive in her life as a result of keeping him away from temptations and sins. Seeing a cemetery In a dream for a girl, it leads her to an emotional relationship, but she will suffer because of many, and the cemetery in the dreamer‚Äôs dream shows the radical transformations that will occur in her next life, transforming her from poor to rich. Seeing the cemetery in a dream by Ibn Sirin Ibn Sirin says that seeing the cemetery in a dream for the dreamer indicates his good treatment of others. His good behavior among people and the cemetery in the dream symbolizes the happy news that he will learn about in the coming days, and he believed that it would be so. Not fulfilled. Seeing digging a cemetery in a dream means the death of the sleeper, so he should wake up from his negligence so that he does not suffer the severe punishment of his Lord for the bad deeds he commits and bury him in the cemetery. A woman‚Äôs dream indicates that she is enjoying good health and the end of the health crises that she went through in the previous days. The Asrar website for interpreting dreams is a site specialized in dream interpretation in the Arab world, just write. A site about secrets of dream interpretation. Search on Google and get the correct interpretations. Seeing a cemetery in a dream for a single woman. A cemetery in a dream for an unmarried woman indicates the state of sadness and anguish in which she lives because of her uncertain future and her fear of loneliness. Seeing a destroyed cemetery in a dream for a girl leads to quarrels and internal conflicts that may lead to a rift between her and her family, and burying the cemetery in the dreamer‚Äôs dream indicates her close marriage. From a wealthy young man who has a high social status and with whom they enjoy affection and stability. Seeing a cemetery in a dream for a married woman. Seeing a cemetery in a dream for a married woman indicates the sad news that she will learn, and her husband‚Äôs marriage to another may be due to her negligence and following the secrets of others and charlatans. The time is near and happiness and joy will rule her home in the coming season. Watching the renovation of a cemetery in a woman‚Äôs dream leads to her requesting to divorce her husband as a result of his weak character and lack of responsibility. Seeing a cemetery in a dream for a pregnant womanSeeing a cemetery in a dream for a pregnant woman symbolizes a lot of goodness and benefits that she will receive in the future. The coming days will pass the labor stage safely and in good health. Seeing a bright cemetery in a dream indicates the good offspring that she will receive from her Lord. He will support her until they improve their upbringing and will be useful to society and be proud of them and the superiority and advancement they have achieved. Seeing a cemetery in a dream for a divorced woman. Seeing a cemetery in a dream for a divorced woman indicates On her victory over the lies and wrong words that her ex-husband spread to the world in order to discredit her. The cemetery in a woman's dream symbolizes many benefits and nourishment
